text: Stupid bike!
Darn it!
Why didn't anyone wake me up?!
I can't believe they left without me!
I bet they think this is so funny, those idiots!
They're... so... dead!
Look, it's Kusugi!
Huh?
[Adoring sigh]
[Shy giggles]
[Startled gasp]
Hey, you're the-
[Pained grunt]
I made it on time!
Hey! Why didn't you wake me up?!
Is this your idea of a joke?! 'Cause it's not funny at all!
Because of you, I had to take this shortcut and then I-
- Huh? - Look.
What do you mean? Look down?
[Choking gasp]
[Shocked yell]
I'm so sorry! Are you okay?!
You again with that bike!
Huh? Again?
Watch where you're going with that thing, you stupid brat!
You can't just run over everyone in the street!
Don't you know who I am?!
Did you see that?! It's like she never rode a bike before!
- Well, she'd better stay away from me... - Is he weird or what?
Well, you hit him with your bike, Yuzu.
Because of the incident the other day in the auditorium,
the school has decided to recruit students
with potential to form a priestess club.
There will be one student from each class.
Just based on past experience, any volunteers?
Oh...
No way, Sis!
Kurako. Not "Sis."
Uh, oh yeah.
Miss Kurako?
Yes, Miss Hieda?
Ahem.
It's not fair! You can't make me join that club!
I'm proud to say that I've never been in any clubs
and I'm not going to let you change that now!
- Okay, Miss Hieda. I won't make you join. - Why does she have to be so weird?
- That's right! - Miss Kurako.
Yes, Mr. Kusugi?
I might not have the most experience at fighting demons,
but I would think that it takes a certain amount of skill and coordination.
Though I'm sure there are some very talented students at this school,
do you think they are really up to the task?
As the representative of the Inao Shrine, I will be the judge of that.
The best weapon against evil is a pure soul
and I'm sure we have at least a few here.
In fact, I believe that students will be the best qualified for this task.
Sure, Miss Kurako.
But a klutz who can't even ride a bike shouldn't be our class representative.
Heh.
[Annoyed growl]
Hey, Sis! I'll join that club!
I know I can do it!
[Exasperated sigh]
What?!
No one from the other classes has volunteered?!
Yeah, well, not quite the turnout I was hoping for.
But I guess I shouldn't have expected anyone
to volunteer for a club to fight demons.
So, wait. Do I still have to be in the club then?
What? But I didn't make you join.
You volunteered.
Oh! I didn't mean it!
Besides, I thought you had your own reasons for joining the club.
Huh?
Won't you be protecting someone special?
Huh? Oh.
Hiro will be in danger!
And I'm the only one who can protect him!
Anyway, I'm sure it will be fine.
Fate always provides.
You'll find people whose hearts and minds are in harmony with your own.
Then you won't be the only one in your club.
Did that monster hit you on the head one too many times?
Why would we want to join a club that fight demons?
Not if you paid me.
You're sure? Really?
I guess I'm all alone then.
Come on! You're my best friends!
And we're all in different homerooms!
Nuh-uh!
I see how it is.
Cut the guilt, Yuzu. We didn't grow up in a shrine.
We can't do it, okay?
What about all that "girls have to stick together" crap, huh?
[Soft sobbing]
Tears don't work on us, Yuzu.
Hey.
Oh, Kusugi.
Hey.
Headed home?
Uh-huh.
Huh?
Not the best day for you, huh?
Huh? No thanks to her!
Are you gonna be okay?
I'm sorry. Yuzu-
Don't worry about it. Forget it.
I heard you're staying with her.
It's not true, is it, Hiro?
Well... Yeah, I am.
But I think you've got Yuzu pegged all wrong.
She's a klutz, but she really does mean well.
I think she does...
But I can't really tell sometimes.
[Sigh]
I can't believe you have to deal with that girl all the time.
Dude, Yuzu's life really sucks, doesn't it?
I guess so...
Yeah, you're right. She gets to spend all
her high school living with her true love.
I wish I had a true love.
Never gonna happen.
Thanks a lot, Chika.
I gotta find me a boyfriend.
Huh? What's up?
- Shhh! - Hey! What's your problem, Chika?!
- Let go of my arm! - Shut up, okay?
Oh, come on. You've got to be kidding me.
You think Yuzu can protect this school?
What, she'll run demons over with her bike?
Oh, well, I guess you just don't really get along well with Yuzu, huh? [Chuckle]
Of course not! She's a-
[Pained groan]
Are you sure you're okay?
Yeah...
[Embarassed whimper]
Hey...
Okay, did you see that?! Did that really happen?!
It happened.
Huh?
[Annoyed groan]
They're... Do you think they're really...?
[Contented sigh]
They really are!
It's in the picture.
Mm-hmm.
Chika, we... can't tell anyone.
No one?
Oh, why can't I have one, a pretty one?! Just for once!
Y'know...
I know exactly what you mean!
There'll be drama.
This is gonna be really, really good!
We must stick by you until the end!
We must!
A priestess club?
Yes. To help protect the school.
Sounds really cool. Can I join?
No, you're too young.
Why? I'm gonna be a priestess, too!
No, Tama!
Well, I think that's a wonderful idea.
It's nice that you girls have something to keep you busy after school.
But don't you think it's dangerous, sir?
I suppose...
But young men whose reason has been destroyed by raging hormones
are much more dangerous than any demon, don't you think?
Don't listen to Daddy.
What do you mean?! You always listen to me, don't you?
When you talk about boys, we don't!
You're just being silly!
Silly?!
No one else volunteered, so I'll just be in the club by myself anyway.
[Exasperated groan]
What?! You really mean it?!
Mm-hmm.
You guys really want to join the Priestess Club with me?
Of course we do!
Our best friend needs our help and we need to be close we can see what-
I mean, we can support her in her hour of need!
Thank you, Seiko!
Yuzu!
[Happy squeal]
What's going on over there?
I got your back, bro.
Huh?
I have the best friends in the whole world!
